entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have destroyed an enemy turret.
entries.journal_entry_description: Destroy an enemy turret so that the enemy has no cover and concealment.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Any turret destroyed will disrupt the enemy defenses.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The turret has been destroyed. Job well done.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The turret has been destroyed. Job well done.
